short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a button for converting the folder contents into one .txt file and adding this to the ChatGPT chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily add the contents of a big folder to the context of your ChatGPT chat. 

This extension creates a button to upload the contents of a folder. The files in this folder are being concatenated into big text file which is then added to the chat. 

This is can be helpful if you want to show chatgpt the contents of complex coding projects consisting of multiple files.

Currently docx, PDF and Sheet files are not supported yet.
